entities.name: susan bones
entities.description: Susan Bones is described as wobbling in her hoop, indicating that she is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: hufflepuff
entities.description: Hufflepuff is mentioned as the house to which Susan Bones belongs.

entities.name: wilkie twycross
entities.description: Wilkie Twycross is described as a Head of House and an expert in magic, indicating that he is a teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: hoop
entities.description: The hoop is mentioned as the object with which Susan Bones was practicing her magic.

entities.name: hall
entities.description: The Hall is mentioned as the location where Wilkie Twycross reappears after disappearing.

relationships.description: Susan Bones is a member of Hufflepuff house.
Wilkie Twycross reappears in the Hall.
Susan Bones was practicing her magic with a hoop.
Wilkie Twycross helps Susan Bones after she experiences splinching.
